text: Sleek, powerful, and reliable the Lenovo V14 G3 delivers excellent value for professionals and students alike. The Lenovo V14 G3 combines performance and portability perfectly. With a 12th Gen Intel Core i7, 16GB RAM, and 512GB SSD, it offers smooth multitasking and fast performance. The 14" FHD display is clear and vibrant, and the 1.70 kg weight makes it ideal for on-the-go use. Windows 11 MS Office and backed by a 1-year onsite warranty. A top pick for performance and practicality in a compact form. Read more
